price: (9) Then[874] We fulfilled for them the promise, and We saved them and whom We willed and destroyed the transgressors.
arabic: ثُمَّ صَدَقۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡوَعۡدَ فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَمَن نَّشَآءُ وَأَهۡلَكۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ
footnotes: [874]- Once they had conveyed the message.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: thumma ṣadaqnāhumu al-waʿda fa-anjaynāhum waman nashāu wa-ahlaknā al-mus'rifīna
